headline: Is Carrier Global’s (CARR) New AI Tool Quietly Reshaping Its Building-Tech Moat?
summary: Carrier Global’s Abound platform recently introduced “Tell Me More,” a generative AI feature that gives facility managers and technicians richer context and step‑by‑step guidance on predictive maintenance insights across more than 150,000 connected building assets. By blending operational data with AI trained on technical manuals, the tool aims to shorten troubleshooting times and support knowledge transfer as HVAC technician shortages intensify. With this new AI-assisted guidance for...

headline: CARR to Report Q4 Earnings: What's in Store for the Stock?
summary: CARR heads into Q4 earnings with strength in Commercial HVAC and aftermarket services, offset by residential weakness across key markets.

headline: Assessing Carrier Global (CARR) Valuation After Recent Short Term Share Price Strength
summary: Carrier Global stock: what recent performance tells you Carrier Global (CARR) has drawn fresh attention after recent trading, with the share price at $60.36 and short term returns of 1 day at 1.3% and past week at 5.2%. Over the month and past 3 months, the stock shows total returns of 12.8% and 4.9%, while the 1 year total return is a 3.0% decline and the 5 year figure stands at 62.9%. headline: Parks Associates and Carrier Release New Research at DistribuTECH on HVAC and Grid Flexibility
summary: At DistribuTECH, Parks Associates, in partnership with Carrier Global Corporation, today released a new white paper, Demand Response for All: Scaling Capacity & Flexibility, examining how utilities can expand demand response (DR) and time-of-use (TOU) programs by leveraging HVAC systems, behind-the-meter storage, and innovative program design.
